Plot: On the steppes of Kazakhstan, Asa lives in a yurt with his sister Samal, her husband Ondas, and their three children. Ondas is a herdsman, tough and strong. It's dry, dusty, and windy; too ...
Title: Tulpan
Actors: Tolepbergen Baisakalov, Samal Yeslyamova, Ondas Besikbasov, Bereke Turganbayev
tomatoConsensus: Kazakh sheep herders get their cinematic due in this lovely, unsentimental debut from director Sergei Dvortsevoy.
Country: Kazakhstan, Russia, Germany, Poland, Switzerland, Italy
